TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WorkflowServiceHostFactory extends System.ServiceModel.Activation.ServiceHostFactoryBase

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The WF3 types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new WF4 types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 在 Managed 裝載環境中提供 執行個體的處理站，在這個環境中會動態建立主機執行個體以回應傳入訊息。

span.span: Factory that provides instances of in managed hosting environments where the host instance is created dynamically in response to incoming messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支援動態啟動的 Managed 裝載環境包括網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 和 Windows Process Activation Service (WAS)。The managed hosting environments that support dynamic activation are Internet Information Services (IIS) and Windows Process Activation Service (WAS). 如果您已實作了 的自訂衍生，建議您一併實作衍生自 類別的處理站。If you have implemented a custom derivative of , consider also implementing a factory that derives from the class. 反之，如果您已實作了 的自訂衍生，建議您一併實作直接從 衍生您處理站的處理站。If you have implemented a custom derivative of instead, then consider also implementing a factory that derives your factory from directly.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase CreateServiceHost (string constructorString, Uri[] baseAddresses);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase CreateServiceHost(string constructorString, class System.Uri[] baseAddresses) cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreateServiceHost (constructorString As String, baseAddresses As Uri()) As ServiceHostBase
public: override System::ServiceModel::ServiceHostBase ^ CreateServiceHost(System::String ^ constructorString, cli::array <Uri ^> ^ baseAddresses);

param.name: constructorString
param.span: 工作流程標記檔案的檔案名稱，此檔案定義了工作流程服務，或工作流程服務型別的型別名稱。

span.span: The file name of the workflow markup file that defines the workflow service or the type name of the workflow service type.

param.name: baseAddresses
param.span: 型別為 的陣列，其中包含所裝載之服務的基底位址。

span.span: An array of type that contains the base addresses for the hosted service.

summary.span: 從含有工作流程標記檔案之檔案名稱的字串，或含有工作流程服務型別名稱與指定的服務基底位址之字串，來建立 。

span.span: Creates a from a string that contains either the file name of the workflow markup file or the type name of the workflow service type and the base address of the service specified.

returns.span: 與工作流程服務關聯的 物件。

span.span: A object associated with the workflow service.

returns.span: 預設實作會傳回含有指定基底位址的 物件。

span.span: The default implementation returns a object with the specified base addresses.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `constructorString` 引數可以是完整的工作流程型別名稱，或者也可以是 .svc 檔案中宣告的工作流程定義檔之相對檔案路徑 ( 指示詞放在這個 .svc 檔中)。The `constructorString` argument could be either a fully qualified workflow type name or it could be the relative file path of the workflow definition file declared in the .svc file in which directives are placed. > [!NOTE] > 若要將規則定義與工作流程定義關聯在一起，請將規則定義檔命名為工作流程定義檔相同的檔名，加上 .rules 副檔名，並將此檔案置於工作流程定義檔的相同目錄中。To associate a rule definition with a workflow definition, name the rule definition file the same name as the workflow definition file with a .rules extension and place it in same directory as the workflow definition file. 例如，規則定義檔 CalculatorServiceWorkflow.rules 必須跟 CalculatorServiceWorkflow.xoml 放在同一個目錄。For example, the rules definition file CalculatorServiceWorkflow.rules must be in the same directory as CalculatorServiceWorkflow.xoml. ## Examples 以下是工作流程服務 CalculatorServiceWorkflow 的型別式參照範例。The following is an example of a type-based reference to the workflow service CalculatorServiceWorkflow. ``` <%@ServiceHost language=c# Debug="true" Factory="System.ServiceModel.Activation.WorkflowServiceHostFactory" Service="CalculatorServiceWorkflow" %> ``` 以下是工作流程服務 CalculatorServiceWorkflow 的工作流程定義檔參照範例。The following is an example of a workflow definition file reference to the workflow service CalculatorServiceWorkflow. ``` <%@ServiceHost language=c# Debug="true" Factory="System.ServiceModel.Activation.WorkflowServiceHostFactory" Service="CalculatorServiceWorkflow.xoml" %> ```
